attributes.action: Dover deserves Better. Better infrastructure on the A20
attributes.additional_details:
Dover gets cut off by lorries due to Operation Stack not being implemented and lorries being in the right hand side lane.

This is not a non regular occurence and due to the development and increased usage at the Port of Dover this is due to get worse.

We would like solutions to stop lorries being stuck for more than 10 miles bumper to bumper for hours on end and for the town of Dover to be effectively cut off.
